title: 7-Day Peru Deep Dive: Lima, Cusco, Sacred Valley, and Machu Picchu Tour
description: This week-long tour is crafted for travelers who want to dive deep in Peru. Wander the neighborhoods of modern Lima. Enjoy the architecture and archaeology in and around Cusco (including Moray, Moras, and Pisac). Explore the beauty of the Sacred Valley. Then take a train and a bus to Machu Picchu, the most famous destination in the country.

A magical trip to Peru.

Aug 2025
A magical visit to Peru’s wonderful Incan sites. We stayed at five star hotels and resorts including a centuries old monastery that is now an elegant hotel. Our party of ten traveled in a comfortable van with a great driver who managed our luggage flawlessly. We also had great guides. All said, it was a fabulous trip.
Written August 15, 2025

Dear Mr. Bill K.,

Our party of ten traveled in a comfortable van with a great driver who managed our luggage flawlessly. We also had great guides. All said, it was a fabulous trip.

reviews.title: Beautiful Peru, from Inca culture to trekking in Macchu Picchu! Great experience!
reviews.text: We are very grateful to Jonas, Fiorella, Arthuro and the entire Peruvian Sunrise agency for our wonderful holiday! We had with our 10 year old son very great adventures and we were super looked after around the clock!Thank you and we plan the Amazon region with you next year! Thanks for the flexibility and support!

reviews.title: Totally recommended whatever your plans
reviews.text: We could not have been more wrong with our initial wariness of booking direct with an overseas operator.  In fact it was the best decision ever and meant we had a wonderful trip and did not follow the crowds.The whole team were great from start to finish.   Initially Kevin taking the booking and dealing with our queries, Firorella reaching out before we departed, meeting us with tickets and keeping us updated to the minute when our train was delayed due to a landslide at Machu Picchu.Hotels chosen were in great locations, all pick ups and drop offs were on time and reliable.Our guide around MP, Javier, was fantastic.Overall we had an enjoyable and stress free introductory  first (of hopefully more) visit to Peru.

reviews.title: excellent planning our private trip
reviews.text: We spent 4 days in Cusco Matchu Pitchu and Lima and were superbly looked after before and during our private trip.All change requests regarding private transfer or German speaking guides were implemented immediately.Fiorella in particular is to be singled out!!!I have not experienced better care than Fiorella has given me in recent decades.gladly back in 2027

reviews.title: Amazing Machu Picchu-Cusco-Lima experience
reviews.text: Peruvian Sunrise was meticulous in planning the trip with us from a few months back. Kevin was very accommodating in our trip curation. During the trip, the guides were very professional and friendly and very knowledgeable as well. Fiorella managed our operations and was available the many times we needed. Natalie was our guide in Cusco and she was really amazing. My kids loved the way she narrated and taught us all about the interesting facts about Cusco. She was in tune with our needs as well as we had missing baggage and needed clothes and shoes. She also understood the various needs of the family and accommodated so tirelessly. The altitude sickness was hitting some of us and she helped with some oil and made the tour bearable as well. Her energy was amazing.Machu Picchu was a marvellous experience and PS planned it very well for us. Immaculate timing and weather. We loved it. The tour back in Lima was very relaxing and beautiful. The Barranco neighbourhood was our favourite. The hotels curated were great. We had to cancel a mountain trip in Cusco and we had requested for spa alternatives and PS accommodated all very well. Thank you!!!

reviews.title: Very organized and complete
reviews.text: The tour company was amazing.  They cater to what you want during your trip and they are professional and diligent with the details.

reviews.title: Excellent tour!
reviews.text: This was a wonderful tour. Well organized and the tour guides were all very friendly and knowledgeable. Hotels were all very nice, clean and comfortable. Tour vehicles were clean and safe with good drivers. I highly recommend this tour. We would gladly go again!

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Excellent service! From booking to ending of the trip, they keep the communication going very well, drivers, staff and tour guides are very friendly and professional.

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.text: Excellent planning and organizing, all the tours were on time and airport transfers were made very easy. We had an absolutely fantastic time with our family touring Peru.

reviews.title: Well-organized
reviews.text: The trip is very organized. From airport transfers to tours, everything is well kept. Hotels are great, clean and very accessible to everything. If you love supporting local, this is a perfect tour.
